subject: Re: The AAF - https://www.theaaf.com.au/
preview: Thanks Joel, appreciate you sorting this out

full_threads.body:
Thanks Joel,
appreciate you sorting this out

Hi Kosta,

I hope all is well.

Upon checking all the items.
  1. Form/Funnel Functionality:
    I've tested the forms and funnels across the website, and everything is functioning as expected.
  2. CRM Integration:
    All form submissions are being correctly routed into the PDWISE.

Also, I’ve updated the notification email to dom@theaaf.com.au as requested.

Let me know if you’d like me to re-test any specific funnel or if there’s anything else you’d like reviewed.

Hi Joel,

Please have it go to dom@theaaf.com.au

Furthermore please confirm the following:

1) Are all of the forms/funnels working correctly on the website? i.e no issue submitting details?
2) Are those details flowing into the crm correctly across all forms?

Cheers,
Kosta

Hi Kosta,

I hope you're doing well.

Thanks for updating the account.

We’ve confirmed that the forms are correctly connected to PDWise. However, after looking into it further, we noticed that when the form is submitted to dominic@theaaf.com.au, it returns the following error message:
"There was an error trying to send your message. Please try again later."
To troubleshoot this, we've updated the recipient email to info@theaaf.com.au for now.

Please let us know if there’s an alternative email address you’d prefer we use instead.

Hi Kosta,

We’re currently working on this, but we’re unable to proceed further without access to certain parts of the account. Could you please update the access permissions so we can view the Contacts and the Settings > API page?

We need to verify whether the site is correctly linked and ensure the connection is functioning as expected.

Appreciate your help with this.

Hi Joel,

Please advise we need all forms/funnels working + feeding information into CRM.
This ticket has been waiting for over 24 hours.

Hi Kosta,

Thank you! confirming I can access it now. We will update you once we do our testing

Hi Kosta,

I hope all is well.

Upon checking, we are still unable to access it. my user name is joel@wolfiq.com.au

Hi Kosta,

I hope you're well.

We're currently looking into this, but we're encountering a permissions error when trying to access PDWise. Could you please review and adjust the roles and permissions so we can gain access and proceed with testing? joel@wolfiq.com.au

action.text: Manuel Lito Manceli assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body: @ricaR I've updated the plugin and verified that the SMTP settings are working correctly. However, the forms are still not functioning. I'm not sure what else might be causing the issue — @joel could you please check and help to identify the possible problem? Thanks!

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Manuel Lito Manceli

full_threads.body:
Hi team,

Can you please check all forms/funnels on the site, it doesnt seem like they are working.

Please check all and ensure they are working properly.

Please confirm.

Cheers,
Kosta

Kosta Galanis
Performance Lead
